question: 話し方
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>way</kanji> of <kanji>speak</kanji>ing is your <vocabulary>way of speaking</vocabulary> (or it could be your <vocabulary>speaking style</vocabulary>). This is how someone talks. Some people have an interesting speaking style, after all.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words <ja>話す</ja> and <ja>方</ja>. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
